data.decision: Crash drill protocol for Duro reembed verification
data.rationale: Need to verify operational resilience, not just "works on good days". The drill proves stuck repairs get cleaned up, system stays usable, and audit trail captures failures.
data.context: Drill recipe: 1) Start duro_reembed artifact_type=fact limit=100, 2) Wait for heartbeat, 3) Kill server process, 4) Restart server, 5) Verify: duro_list_repairs shows failed entry, duro_health_check still OK, duro_semantic_search works, no queue drift.
